Adventurer:DefaultCommonSkill.NAME: Basic Defend
Adventurer:DefaultCommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL adventurer:Level (Bonus from : !Adventurer:OneSixth!. The factor is 1)

Adventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Adventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Adventurer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Adventurer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Adventurer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Adventurer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Adventurer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Adventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Adventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Adventurer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Adventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Adventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Adventurer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

Adventurer:Strike_Adventurer.NAME: Lesser Strike
Adventurer:Strike_Adventurer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL (Bonus from adventurer:Level: !Adventurer:OneSixth!. The factor is 0.6)

Adventurer:Defend_Adventurer.NAME: Lesser Defend
Adventurer:Defend_Adventurer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL (Bonus from adventurer:Level: !Adventurer:OneSixth!. The factor is 0.6)

Adventurer:AdventurerForm.NAME: Adventurer Form
Adventurer:AdventurerForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporarily Level and !M! at the start of your turn

Adventurer:TakeRest.NAME: Take a rest
Adventurer:TakeRest.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heal !M! HP and increase playtime by 1 minute.

Adventurer:Strike.NAME: Strike
Adventurer:Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL adventurer:Combo: Lesser Strike NL (Combo bonus damage: 2 + 1.5 Level)
